about_dialog: This app is built with Flutter and allows you to explore important places in Türkiye.
about_body:
This application is developed with Flutter.
Version: 1.0.0

With this map-based mobile application, you can explore important places in Türkiye, access detailed information, and easily navigate through the user-friendly interface.

Built using Flutter’s powerful infrastructure and modern design elements, the app offers practical and effective user experience with features like map view, detail pages, and a navigation menu.
onboard_desc_1: Discover marked locations and learn the details!
onboard_desc_2: Navigate the map and find places!
onboard_desc_3: Add new places to your route and start exploring!
